Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Oh that was fast! Did you catch them all?

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: They withstood a bit. I had to bring them cold.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: No worries. Here is your money. *Gives a bunch of Imperial Credits*

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Wait... these are Imperial Credits.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: They are still valuable and spent.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: The empire is gone, I do not know if you heard about It. The value of these credits is decreasing rapidly.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: It is all I got.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Fine.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: We have a deal then! Why not take a drink and relax a little bit?

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: I guess that’s a resounding no. Well, let’s see what I have.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Mmm... One water smuggler, another water smuggler...

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: I will take them all.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Wow wait! There are other members of the Guild. This is all I have.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: What is your higher bounty then?

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Not much. Around 5.000

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: That will not even cover fuel these days.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Well, there is one job.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Let me see the pug.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: No pug. Face to face. Direct commission. Deep pocket. Just for you.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Underworld?

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: I do not know. All I know is there is no chain code. Do you want the chit or not? All instructions are in this hologram.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Hope to see you soon! *Hands a hologram to Mando*

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: *Takes the hologram, It has an imperial stamp on It and actives It*

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Greetings Bounty Hunter. If you are listening to this message I can understand two things.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: One, that Greef Karga thinks you are the best in the parsec and two, that you are expensive.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Very expensive. Indeed, that is not a problem we may have to involve ourselves in. I guess you have no clue or information about what you are looking for.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Unfortunately, neither do I, at least from the point of view of localization.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Let me tell you all you need to know. I am afraid this job is a less traditional agreement.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: About the chain code, we can only provide you 4 digits, Its age.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: You are looking for a 50 years old creature, Its last localization was in Arvala-7, a couple of days ago.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: With that little information, a man of your skill should make a profitable work out of this.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: About the bounty, I need It alive. Although, I acknowledge that bounty hunting is a complicated profession.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: This being the case, proof of termination is also acceptable for a lower fee.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: It is good to restore the natural order of things after a period of such disarray. That is all.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Contact me when you finish the job, I have a tones of Beskar waiting for you upon the delivery of the asset. *End of transmission*
